list.name: 更改
list.comment:
chore(build): 更新项目构建配置和IDE设置
- 在模块配置中添加资源文件夹路径 - 配置Java编译器参数支持 - 设置UTF-8编码配置 - 添加Maven仓库配置包括阿里云镜像 - 优化pom.xml中的依赖管理和插件配置 - 更新IDE工作区配置和任务记录

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Docker.resources/Docker Compose.yml: Compose 部署.executor": "Run", "Docker.resources: Compose 部署.executor": "Run", "Maven.campus-security-backend [clean].executor": "Run", "Maven.campus-security-backend [compile].executor": "Run", "RequestMappingsPanelOrder0": "0", "RequestMappingsPanelOrder1": "1", "RequestMappingsPanelWidth0": "793", "RequestMappingsPanelWidth1": "793", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.TerminalTabsStorage.copyFrom.TerminalArrangementManager.252": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "Spring Boot.SmartCampusApplication.executor": "Run", "com.intellij.ml.llm.matterhorn.ej.ui.settings.DefaultAutoModeForALLUsers.v1": "true", "com.intellij.ml.llm.matterhorn.ej.ui.settings.DefaultModelSelectionForGA.v1": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "junie.onboarding.icon.badge.shown": "true", "kotlin-language-version-configured": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "D:/work/DREAMX/proprogram/SmartCampus-Sentinel/campus-security-backend", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "project.structure.last.edited": "项目", "project.structure.proportion": "0.15", "project.structure.side.proportion": "0.0", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "Docker", "to.speed.mode.migration.done": "true", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true", "应用程序.CodeGenerator.executor": "Run" }, "keyToStringList": { "DatabaseDriversLRU": [ "mysql" ] } }

task.summary:
feat(core): 初始化校园安防平台后端项目配置
- 添加 application.yml 配置文件，包含服务器、数据库、日志、跨域等基础配置 - 配置 Spring Boot、MyBatis-Plus、MySQL 等核心依赖项 - 设置设备心跳超时、最大连接数、报警级别等业务配置参数 - 配置 Maven 构建插件和项目打包设置 - 更新 IDE 配置文件以支持 Java 21 和 Maven 项目管理

chore(build): 更新项目构建配置和IDE设置
- 在模块配置中添加资源文件夹路径 - 配置Java编译器参数支持 - 设置UTF-8编码配置 - 添加Maven仓库配置包括阿里云镜像 - 优化pom.xml中的依赖管理和插件配置 - 更新IDE工作区配置和任务记录
